text: Beware of privatization! 🚨💰 New study shows private-sector ER care is 21% more expensive than VHA care. 💸🏥 VHA providers receive extensive training to better understand and treat veteran-specific issues. 💪🏽👨‍⚕️ Don't let privatization fans like Darin Selnick dismantle our only comprehensive healthcare model! 🤝🏼💕
